review: He has no empathy for patient, and he always comes late 1-2 hour late from the given appointment time. He comes late in between he sees his personal ones and give that time name " privacy" . It feels like for him patient is only the way of income and nothing else. ****** ***** ******* ***** **** ** ******* * ***** *** **** *** ****

I had gone for a High Blood Pressure treatment and the Doctor just prescribed two/three medicines and within five minutes all done.  The Doctor should calmly listen to the patient and explain the course of treatment and natural methods to relax and body.
